forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 3am, then a chance of rain and snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 23, with temperatures rising to around 29 overnight. West southwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 5pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 29, with temperatures falling to around 25 in the afternoon. West wind 14 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 20, with temperatures rising to around 22 overnight. West southwest wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 38. South southwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Skated Coyote from 8 to 10.Softer and more control than Tuesday. Tracks are good with a lot of leaves.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: All trails power-tilled flat with a classic track and wide skate deck. Conditions are very good.

nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails were power-tilled and tracked on Tuesday. We will not groom until the temperature goes below freezing. Coverage is still very good.
nubsNob.comments: It's a warm ski day at Nub's Nob. The temperature is forecast to go above 40 degrees, which should result in  soft snow conditions this afternoon. Snow depth and coverage continues to be very good. Pintail Peak opens this Friday. The Big Park opens on Saturday. Lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
